prompt: Create a professional, corporate-style webpage using Bootstrap. The webpage should include the following sections and use a blue theme color:

sections.name: Header
content: Company logo on the left.
Navigation menu on the right with links to Home, About Us, Services, Portfolio, Blog, and Contact.
Login button in the upper right corner.

sections.name: Hero Section
content: A full-width background image with a semi-transparent overlay.
A headline that reads 'Welcome to Our Company'.
A subheadline that reads 'We deliver excellence'.
A call-to-action button that says 'Get Started'.

sections.name: About Us Section
content: A two-column layout.
The left column contains an image of the team.
The right column contains a brief company description with a headline and paragraph.

sections.name: Services Section
content: A three-column layout.
Each column represents a service offered, with an icon, service name, and brief description.
Use Font Awesome icons for the service icons.

sections.name: Portfolio Section
content: A grid layout showcasing six projects.
Each project includes an image, project title, and a short description.

sections.name: Blog Section
content: A two-column layout.
Each column represents a blog post with a title, short excerpt, and a 'Read More' link.

sections.name: Contact Section
content: A contact form with fields for Name, Email, Subject, and Message.
A map showing the company's location.
Company contact details including address, phone number, and email.

sections.name: Footer
content: Links to Privacy Policy, Terms of Service, and Contact Us.
Social media icons for Facebook, Twitter, LinkedIn, and Instagram.

design.style: fully responsive, modern, and use a consistent blue color scheme
design.css: Include relevant CSS styles and ensure all sections are well-aligned and aesthetically pleasing. The primary color should be blue.
